vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
τρῡμᾰλ-ιά, ἡ,
={τρύμη}, hole, [LXX+3rd c.BC+]; ἡ τ. τῆς ῥαφίδος the eye of the needle, [NT]; βελόνης[Refs 5th c.BC+]; mesh, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: eye (the tear-drop shaped hole of a needle through which thread is passed) opening

eye (the tear-drop shaped hole of a needle through which thread is passed) opening
a hole, perforation; eye, of a needle, Mk. 10:25*
